content: This is awesome! This is the growth hacking list I’ve been looking for. You have just gained a new follower. So far I’ve tried using job boards and Kickofflabs for my fintech startup Jellifin. I would recommend using BetaList and KickoffLabs together. We’ve gained a couple hundred sign ups using the combo. I’m going try Back.ly and Quora next to see how those work ;)
